body.name: Retevis Shoulder Speaker Mic 2 Pin Walkie Talkie Speaker Microphone Compatible with Retevis H-777 RT21 RT22 RT68 RT86 RT85 RT22S RT19 RT17 Baofeng UV-5R UV-82 888S Arcshell AR-5 2 Way Radio(1 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 9 mins
features: Loud speaker; remote speaker give you clear and loud voice so you can hear your teammates clearly
Kevlar reinforced spring cable; durable PU coil cord allows you extremely get long term usage experience
Non-slip durable PTT with sensitive mic; push to talk button and remote mic allow you clip it to collar close to mouth to transmit clear for hands free conversations

The remote mic speaker with standard 2 pin k head plug type; former pin diameter of 3.5 mm and 2.5 mm in diameter after pin, double pin from 8 mm within; allows work with most brands walkie talkies;but not compatible with Motorola and Midland two way radios
Strong swivel clips allow you to hold the mic in collar; pockets or other convenient place

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality mic for the RT5!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mic to pair with the RT5 and it works great! Fits in the radio well with clear sound receiving and transmitting.Great value for the money, PLUS Retevis' customer service is top notch!They reply quickly and patiently answered all my questions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The Mic is clear and loud enough to hear what is being transmitted. I have had it for 8 weeks and use it 5 days a week at work. Have had no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Revised pending replacement product - No transmit audio.
reviews.reviewText: *** FINAL UPDATE *** Angela at Retevis was as good as her word. The replacement microphone works as well. It is not as clear as some, but far better than any others in the under $15 price range. This is a hot mic, and needs to be held at least 8 inches from your face. Audio quality is good. The strength of this mic is the way it feels in your hand... Perfect for desk or mobile use. Signal reports reflect good, strong audio, without a lot of background noise. Overall, a great deal for the money. I'm holding off on the 5th star pending further signal reports and testing. Overall, I like it a lot.My sincere appreciation goes out to Angela Lee and the team at Retevis. I have never had better customer service from any vendor. They bent over backwards to make this right.*** UPDATE *** I received a phone call from Angela Lee at Retevis. After discussing the problem, she will be sending me a replacement microphone at no cost. Angela was polite, courteous and helpful. What impressed me most was receiving an international phone call within hours of posting my review. It is hard to beat responsive customer service like that. For now, I am altering my review to three stars instead of one based on the great customer service. I will do a final revision once the replacement is received and tested.Hopefully, mine was just a bad example. Construction seems solid, although the clip is cheap and not likely to hold up under hard use. But it has almost no audio output on transmit. TX audio is about 25% of what it should be, and what there is is so muffled and distorted as to be useless for transmitting.Tested on Baofeng GT-3, UV-82, UV-5R%, and TYT MD-380 radios.No TX audio on any of the three.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and functional
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect accessory for the Retevis walkie talkies

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't last but the company made things right.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this in January 2022. My husband was very pleased. Clear sound and he could be heard clearly. Then March 16th it quit working like it should. He could hear the calls coming in but couldn't respond. Every attempt failed when he was trying to call out. So don't waste your money on this one. Find something better that will last longer then a few weeks.UPDATE:The company reached out to me following my review. They stand behind their product and issued me a full refund in order to purchase another to replace the one that broke. Like I had stated my husband really liked their product. It's just our luck it broke after a few weeks. I will change my 1 star review to a 3 because the company made things right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Microphone is obstructed / blocked. Tx cannot be understood
reviews.reviewText: Ordered (10) of these for our handhelds. Baefong / Ansoko 16 channel handhelds.I have approximately 30 handhelds in rotation.Pro - will fit a variety of 2 pin radios. - Fits well in hand and the Tx switch has a strong, solid feel - Clip is aggressive and rotates to allow for optimal placementCon - Your transmit absolutely cannot be understood. I've got a pretty good sense how most things in life work and my take is that the pick up microphone is obscured. Despite some passive access restriction features I plan to peak inside one of these and see if I can apply corrective modifications.Would I purchase these again? No. It is imperative that user be understood.Will most likely have to return these to distributor.Update to earlier. The microphone is most definitely obstructed. See photos. The socket for the microphone isn’t located in the area of the sound slots and the slots are solid preventing the device from functioning correctly.That’s that. Definitely a manufacturing error.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just makes the walkie much easier to use
reviews.reviewText: The clip on the back of the mic allows it to attach to your shirt for ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I know some people prefer a heftier (weight) mic but realistically these are inexpensive and work just fine for my application.
This Speaker Microphone has an amazing feel, Light weight with incredible sound quality. Great and lots of fun to use with the Walkie Talkies.
My package advices after 12 hours of being ordered!! And one of the best quality mics I have bought Amazon before. Highly recommend!

The speaker provides good audio. I ended up taking the cover apart and drilling some additional holes to allow more air to get to the microphone. People complained that my voice sounded muffled until I added the extra holes.
Great product easy to use. Arrived nice and early
I bought one and then ordered another one.Good audio and I discovered that the clip rotates on the backof the mike so I can put it in any position.A strong metalic click locks it in place..
